The claim is based on an op: ed written by Senator Ron Johnson in the Wall Street Journal.
Senator Johnson cited the Armed Conflict: Event Data Project (ACLED) in his op-ed to support his assertion.
The ACLED report mentioned by Johnson fo: more than 93% of all demonstrations connected to the movement" were non-violent.
The author of the ACLED report: Sam Jones, stated that Senator Johnson took the overall figures out of context and distorted the report's key conclusions.
